data.name: King Rabbit
data.detailed_description:
The tutorial will introduce new mechanics in a natural and exploratory way. As you progress the difficulty will increase while you master the nuances of each item and how it interacts with the world. You might find your brain hurting. The relaxed nature of King Rabbit allows you to take as much time and as many lives as you need. Once you're finished with that you can enjoy endless community levels and even build your own.


Play levels created by the community! If you enjoy a level show the builder some love and give them a tip :). King Rabbit is very community driven.


Feeling creative? Create your own levels and earn tips from the community with your published levels. We couldn't keep up with player demand for levels so we created the level builder, the possibilities are endless.


Watch other players play King Rabbit. Spectating experienced players is an entertaining way to learn the game.


View statistics for your levels so you can track your performance. You can also watch replays of people playing your levels. This is a good way to see where your level might be too difficult or frustrating for the player.


Collect fun and expressive character skins randomly hidden in levels. You'll be able to show off your character when people spectate you and when people play your levels. Some characters will be rare and very difficult to find.


New items, skins, and level themes are on the way. These will be added slowly, thank you for your patience.


After several updates we will begin porting over to other platforms including console and mobile. You will be able to sync your progress on any device.
data.about_the_game:
The tutorial will introduce new mechanics in a natural and exploratory way. As you progress the difficulty will increase while you master the nuances of each item and how it interacts with the world. You might find your brain hurting. The relaxed nature of King Rabbit allows you to take as much time and as many lives as you need. Once you're finished with that you can enjoy endless community levels and even build your own.


Play levels created by the community! If you enjoy a level show the builder some love and give them a tip :). King Rabbit is very community driven.


Feeling creative? Create your own levels and earn tips from the community with your published levels. We couldn't keep up with player demand for levels so we created the level builder, the possibilities are endless.


Watch other players play King Rabbit. Spectating experienced players is an entertaining way to learn the game.


View statistics for your levels so you can track your performance. You can also watch replays of people playing your levels. This is a good way to see where your level might be too difficult or frustrating for the player.


Collect fun and expressive character skins randomly hidden in levels. You'll be able to show off your character when people spectate you and when people play your levels. Some characters will be rare and very difficult to find.


New items, skins, and level themes are on the way. These will be added slowly, thank you for your patience.


After several updates we will begin porting over to other platforms including console and mobile. You will be able to sync your progress on any device.
data.short_description: King Rabbit is a puzzle-platformer sandbox. The objective is simple but the journey will challenge your mind. Find the gold key and unlock the cage trapping your rabbit friends. Enjoy endless community levels and create your own with the level builder!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 210
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 710
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370 2048 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370 2048 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
